scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:android: cd android/ && gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android
scripts.newclear: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache clean --force && npm i
scripts.android:install: cd android && gradlew assembleRelease && gradlew installRelease
scripts.android:hockeyapp: cd android && gradlew assembleRelease && puck -submit=auto app/build/outputs/apk/app-release.apk
scripts.android:shake: $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb devices | grep '\t' | awk '{print $1}' | sed 's/\s//g' | xargs -I {} $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb -s {} shell input keyevent 82
scripts.lintdiff: git diff --name-only --cached --relative | grep '\.js$' | xargs standard | snazzy
scripts.git-hook: npm run lint -s && npm run test -s
